sentence.Network_en: This phenomenon, sometimes called wanderlust, may explain why people spend so much time and money on trips to interesting places.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种现象, 有时叫做旅游癖, 可以用来解释为什么人们会把那么多时间和金钱花在有趣的旅游场所.

sentence.Network_en: His wanderlust would not allow him to stay long in one spot.
sentence.Network_cn: 他酷爱旅游，无法在一个地方久留。

sentence.Network_en: Adventure: The bariaur's wanderlust makes them an ideal adventurer.
sentence.Network_cn: 冒险: 半人羊的漫游癖使得他们成为理想的冒险者.

entry.def: Someone who has wanderlust has a strong desire to travel.

example.ex: His wanderlust would not allow him to stay long in one spot.
example.tran: 他酷爱旅游，无法在一个地方久留。

means.word_mean: 1. very strong or irresistible impulse to travel

sentences.en: This phenomenon, sometimes called wanderlust, may explain why people spend so much time and money on trips to interesting places.
sentences.cn: 这种现象，有时叫做旅游癖，可以用来解释为什么人们会把那么多时间和金钱花在有趣的旅游场所。
